hopobject.name: ccrma
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.5; rv:6.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0
hopobject.body: Satellite CCRMA promotes rapid prototyping of new media. Used by artists and engineers alike, Satellite CCRMA integrates together open-source software and hardware projects. Most importantly, it comes with examples that make it possible for new users to get up and running within a matter of minutes.
hopobject.shortdesc: Stanford Center for Computer Research in Music and Acoustics
